word: G4237 - πρασιά - prasiá - pras-ee-ah' - In ranks

sections.paragraph: a plot of ground, a garden - bed
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Perhaps from πράσον prason (a leek, and so an onion patch); a garden plot, that is, (by implication of regular beds) a row (repeated in plural by Hebraism to indicate an arrangement): - in ranks.
